it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents one single player
    See Also:

      • Player

        public Player(boolean first,
              java.lang.String color,
              java.lang.String nickname)

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run(Square destination)
         throws InvalidDestinationException
        This method is the run action that can be done in a not-frenzy turn
        Parameters:
        destination - This parameter is the final destination where the player wants to move
        Throws:
        InvalidDestinationException - This exception means that the player can't reach the destination

      • grab

        public void grab(Square destination)
          throws InvalidDestinationException,
                 NullAmmoException,
                 ElementNotFoundException
        This method is the grab action that can be done to take ammo
        Parameters:
        destination - This parameter is the final destination where the player wants to move to grab the ammo or the weapon
        Throws:
        InvalidDestinationException - This exception means that the player can't reach the destination
        NullAmmoException - This exception means that the player didn't grab anything
        ElementNotFoundException - This exception means that there isn't a takeable element

      • grabWeapon

        public void grabWeapon(Square destination,
                       int position)
                throws ElementNotFoundException,
                       MaxHandWeaponSizeException
        This method is the grab action that can be done to take a chosen weapon
        Parameters:
        destination - This parameter is the final destination where the player wants to move to grab the ammo or the weapon
        position - This parameter is the position of the weapon that the player wants to pick
        Throws:
        ElementNotFoundException - This exception means that there isn't a takeable element
        MaxHandWeaponSizeException - This exception means that the player has already reached the maximum number of weapons in a hand

      • shoot

        public void shoot(Weapon weapon,
                  Square destination,
                  java.util.ArrayList<TargetParameter> target)
           throws NotLoadedException,
                  InvalidDestinationException,
                  InvalidTargetException,
                  NotThisKindOfWeapon,
                  NoAmmoException,
                  NoOwnerException
        This method define the shoot action that the player can do on a not-frenzy turn
        Parameters:
        weapon - This parameter indicates the weapon that the player has chosen to fire with
        destination - This parameter indicates the final destination that the player wants to reach for fire
        target - This parameter indicates the target (Room,Squares,Players) of the shoot action
        Throws:
        NotLoadedException - This exception means the weapon is not loaded
        InvalidDestinationException - This exception means that the player can't reach the chosen destination
        InvalidTargetException - This exception means that there are is no valid target chosen
        NotThisKindOfWeapon - This exception means that the type of fire is not permitted by that weapon
        NoAmmoException - This exception means that the player doesn't have enough ammo to buy a weapon
        NoOwnerException - This exception means the weapon is not loaded

      • shootType

        private void shootType(Weapon weapon,
                       java.util.ArrayList<TargetParameter> target)
                throws InvalidTargetException,
                       NoOwnerException,
                       NotThisKindOfWeapon,
                       NoAmmoException,
                       NotLoadedException
        This method calls other methods depends of the type of fire the player choose
        Parameters:
        weapon - This parameter is the weapon which the player wants to shoot with
        target - This is the target that the player wants to shoot
        Throws:
        InvalidTargetException - This exception means that there are is no valid target chosen
        NoOwnerException - This exception means that the owner not exists
        NotThisKindOfWeapon - This exception means that the type of fire is not permitted by that weapon
        NoAmmoException - This exception means that the player doesn't have enough ammo to buy a weapon
        NotLoadedException - This exception means the weapon is not loaded

      • endShoot

        public void endShoot(Weapon weapon)
        This method sets the weapon unload and increment the action counter
        Parameters:
        weapon - This parameter is the weapon that will be unloaded

      • usePowerUp

        public void usePowerUp(PowerUp powerUp,
                       TargetParameter target)
                throws InvalidTargetException,
                       NoOwnerException,
                       OnResponseException
        This method is the power up use action
        Parameters:
        powerUp - This parameter is the selected power up to be used
        target - This parameter is the target of the power up effect
        Throws:
        InvalidTargetException - This exception means that there is no valid target chosen
        OnResponseException - This exception is thrown when you try to use a power up that is usable only on response of another action
        NoOwnerException - This exception means that the power up used not have an owner

      • canSee

        boolean canSee(Player target)
        This method allows to answer if the player can see another target player
        Parameters:
        target - This parameter is the target player
        Returns:
        true is the player can see the target player, false in the other case.

      • reload

        public void reload(Weapon weapon)
            throws LoadedException
        This method allows the player to reload the weapon, if the weapon is not already loaded
        Parameters:
        weapon - This parameter is the weapon that the player wants to reload
        Throws:

      • pay

        public void pay(int costBlue,
                int costRed,
                int costYellow,
                java.util.ArrayList<PowerUp> powerUps)
         throws WrongPowerUpException,
                NoAmmoException
        This method pay the ammo for the weapon or the effect of the shoot
        Parameters:
        costBlue - This parameter is the cost blue of the effect or the weapon
        costRed - This parameter is the cost red of the effect or the weapon
        costYellow - This parameter is the cost yellow of the effect or the weapon
        powerUps - This parameter is the list of the power ups that the player wants to use as ammo
        Throws:
        WrongPowerUpException - This exception means that the wrong selected power up
        NoAmmoException - This exception means that the player doesn't have the ammo

      • draw

        public void draw()
          throws MaxHandSizeException
        This method allows the player to draw a power up from the deck of power ups
        Throws:
        MaxHandSizeException - This exception means that the player has more then three cards in hand

                  Player shooter,
                  boolean markActivator)
        This method allows to add the damage counters to this player

        damage - This parameter is the number of damage dealt by the shooter
        shooter - This parameter is the player who shoot
        markActivator - This parameter is true if the damage should convert the marks in damages, false otherwise

      • isOnAdrenalineGrab

        private int isOnAdrenalineGrab()
        This method unlock the first adrenaline improvement
        Returns:
        1 if the player has 3 or more damage counters, 0 otherwise

      • isOnAdrenalineShoot

        private boolean isOnAdrenalineShoot()
        This method unlock the second adrenaline improvement
        Returns:
        true if the player has 6 or more damage counters, false otherwise

      • onFrenzy

        private int onFrenzy()
        This method return an integer for upgrade the movement in a frenzy turn (used for compress grab)
        Returns:
        1 if it's a frenzy turn, 0 otherwise

      • onlyFrenzyAction

        public int onlyFrenzyAction()
        This method return and integer for upgrade the movement in the frenzy action
        Returns:
        1 if the player is the first player or if his final turn comes later then the first player, 0 otherwise
